clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Services at any time for any reason

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text:
We may also use cookies, device information, and IP addresses, along with clear GIFs, cookies and third party services to help us understand in the aggregate how users engage with our products, services, communications, websites, online campaigns, snippets, devices, and other platforms. We use:

  • Google Analytics, which places a cookie on your device, to obtain metrics on how users engage with our websites. This helps us to improve site content.
  • Convert.com and ShareProgress, which place a cookie on your device, to help us test variations of web content. This helps us offer better web experiences to users.
  • DoubleClick and Flashtalking, each of which uses a clear GIF on our download Firefox page. This helps us measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.
  • Yahoo Dot Pixel, which uses JavaScript on our download Firefox page. This helps us measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.
  • HTTP Referral Data, which may be included with Firefox’s installer, to understand the website domain or advertising campaign that referred you to our download page.

case.text: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We may use cookies, clear GIFs, third party web analytics

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If our organizational structure or status changes (if we undergo a restructuring, are acquired, or go bankrupt) we may pass your information to a successor or affiliate.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.
clauses.clause_text: as well as basic data about your interactions with Firefox’s suggested content. This includes the number of times suggested content is displayed or clicked.

case.text: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text:
Firefox by default sends Mozilla HTTP data that may be included with Firefox’s installer.
This enables us to determine the website domain or advertising campaign (if any) that referred you to our download page.

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: Google Analytics, which places a cookie on your device, to obtain metrics on how users engage with our websites.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
clauses.clause_text: Follow the instructions below to prevent data collection about your visits to Mozilla websites:

case.text: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.
clauses.clause_text: The Services are distributed under and subject to the current version of the Mozilla Public License.

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: System logs of your DNS requests are deleted from the service within 24 hours

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: Your information is only shared with third parties when given specific consent
clauses.description: The service does not share user information with any third parties unless users specifically give it permission to do so.
clauses.clause_text:
When do we share your information with others?
<ul>
<li>When we have asked and received your permission to share it.

case.text: Your information is only shared with third parties when given specific consent

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (California, USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: governed by the laws of the state of California, U.S.A.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Firefox does not share your IP address or any other information that could be used to identify you with either Amazon or AdMarketplace.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: see here to manage account data

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).
clauses.clause_text:
We follow the law whenever we receive requests about you from a government or related to a lawsuit.
We'll notify you when we're asked to hand over your personal information in this way unless we're legally prohibited from doing so.

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
We also don't want your personal information for any longer than we need it, so we only keep it long enough to do what we collected it for.
Once we don't need it, we take steps to destroy it unless we are required by law to keep it longer.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
clauses.clause_text: Please minimize the personal information you choose to share on these forums because your comments may be accessible to the public.

case.text: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

clauses.title: The service deletes tracking data after a period of time and allows you to opt out
clauses.clause_text: You can control individual cookie preferences, indicate your cookie preferences to others, and opt-out of web analytics and optimization tools.

case.text: The service deletes tracking data after a period of time and allows you to opt out

clauses.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text: • Breach Alerts: This notifies you if your email address appears in a new data breach.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: In this Privacy Notice, we explain what data Firefox shares and point you to settings to share even less.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected
clauses.description: This service does respect the browser's Do Not Track header and disables all user tracking if it is enabled.
clauses.clause_text: If you have configured your browser to send a “Do Not Track” signal when accessing our websites, Mozilla will not utilize any of the tools described in the Metrics section.

case.text: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text: When we receive requests like this, we'll only release your personal information if we have a good faith belief that the law requires us to do so.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-11-04 10:31:24 UTC, fedada (30172)  Suspended wrote:
          An fascinating discussion will probably be worth comment. There’s no doubt that that you should write more on https://bolaboskujp.com/

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics
clauses.description: If a service expresses a worldview antithetical to the user’s, that is a good signal that they should not use the service. Or conversely, if the service expresses an uncommonly-held belief that the user agrees with and thinks is relevant to the service-user relationship and/or important, they may wish to use that to choose between otherwise comparable services.
clauses.clause_text: At Mozilla, we believe that privacy is fundamental to a healthy internet.

case.text: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics

clauses.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
clauses.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.
clauses.clause_text: We use:

case.text: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

clauses.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: display name

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: California

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: For processing or providing products and services to you, but only if those entities receiving your information are contractually obligated to handle the data in ways that are approved by Mozilla.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: EU, EEA, Switzerland,

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: To help protect you from malicious downloads, Firefox sends basic information about unrecognized downloads to Google's SafeBrowsing Service, including the filename and the URL it was downloaded from.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-05-12 06:42:33 UTC, bangpiano0101 (33629)  wrote:
          Welcome to GO99, which provides the ultimate, diverse and attractive online betting experience! At GO99, we are proud to provide a safe playground. - please click here tải app go99

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
For security purposes, we store the IP addresses used to access your Firefox Account in order to approximate your city and country.
We use this data to send you email alerts if we detect suspicious activity, such as account logins from other locations.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You can change your email subscriptions with Mozilla from our emails (click the link at the bottom) or from the browser (visit Firefox / Preferences / Sync / Manage Account / Email Preferences).

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.
clauses.clause_text: By uploading content, you hereby grant us a nonexclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use your content in connection with the provision of the Services.

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless Mozilla, its contractors, contributors, licensors, and partners, and their respective directors, officers, employees and agents ("Indemnified Parties") from and against any and all third party claims and expenses, including attorneys' fees, arising out of or related to your use of the Services (including, but not limited to, from any content uploaded by you).

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: The copyright license that users grant this service is limited to the parties that make up the service's broader platform.
clauses.clause_text: By uploading content, you hereby grant us a nonexclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use your content in connection with the provision of the Services.

case.text: The copyright license that you grant this service is limited to the parties that make up the service's broader platform.

clauses.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.
clauses.clause_text:
The updated Terms will be posted online.
If the changes are substantive, we will announce the update through Mozilla's usual channels for such announcements such as blog posts and forums.

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: To make your review more convenient, we will post an effective date at the top of this page.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Cookie History: You can accept or decline individual cookies in your Firefox preferences in the Tools/Options/Privacy history section. Note that certain features of our products and services may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITH ALL FAULTS

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: We base the recommendations in about:addons on a cookie.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text: See here to report claims of copyright or trademark infringement.

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any portion of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining portions will remain in full force and effect.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: It is your responsibility to protect your online accounts using strong and different passwords, security questions, two-factor authentication, password managers, and other safety measures.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties
clauses.description:
The Service only shares your information in an aggregated form, which means an anonymized form
that can't be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: We also share aggregated data about the sponsored content you see and click

case.text: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text:
Mozilla may update these Terms from time to time to address a new feature of the Services or to clarify a provision.
The updated Terms will be posted online.
If the changes are substantive, we will announce the update through Mozilla's usual channels for such announcements such as blog posts and forums.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

clauses.title: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country
clauses.description: By using the service, you agree to comply with the applicable laws of the service's jurisdiction, regardless of your location.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Mozilla concerning the Services and are governed by the laws of the state of California, U.S.A., excluding its conflict of law provisions.

case.text: You agree to comply with the law of the service's country

clauses.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
clauses.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.
clauses.clause_text: In the event of a conflict between a translated version of these terms and the English language version, the English language version shall control

case.text: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Location data: When you first use Firefox, it uses your IP address to set your default search provider based on your country.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
